newsitem.title: MEXICO: FORECAST-Mexico 28-day Cetes seen at 25.58 pct.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Mexico 28-day Cetes seen at 25.58 pct.

text.p: Interest rates on Mexico's bewllether 28-day Cetes, or T-bills, are seen rising 120 basis points to 25.58 percent at today's auction, and rates are also seen rising at longer terms, according to a Reuters' survey of 11 Cetes dealers on Tuesday.
Following is a table comparing last week's primary rates versus expectations for this week's auction and the expected change in basis points.
TERM LAST WEEK THIS WEEK'S SURVEY CHANGE
The results will be released by Banco de Mexico at 1830 local time/1930 EDT/2330 GMT.
